item.text: (pa) @#/ ! /sher phyin stong phrag brgya pa bzhugs so/ /
(黃) 大般若經第十三部
@##/ /shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po gcig pa/
phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ shes rab kyi pha
rold tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ pha rol gyis smras pa dang / pha rol gyis bstan
pa la snying por myi lta 'am/ phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po de/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ pha rol gyi dad
pas myi 'gro 'am/ phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/
shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dod chags dang
bcas pa'i sems bskyed pas 'phrogs pa ma yin nam/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems
bskyed pas 'phrogs pa ma yin nam/ gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed pas 'phrogs pa ma yin nam/ phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral

bar ma gyur tam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam zhes
yongs su brtag par bya ste/ gal te phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu zab mo 'di 'chad pa'i tshe/ myi 'jigs myi sngang skrag par myi 'gyur
la/ zhum pa dang yongs su zhum par myi 'gyur zhing / de'i yid phyir nur bar mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos par dga' la/ thos nas kyang 'dzin cing 'chang la/
klog cing kun chub par byed de/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed la/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan du byed na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su dris shing yongs su brtag pa byas pa dang / bzung zhing bcangs te/ kun chub par byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byas par rig par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/

de ni 'di ltar phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa'i tshe/ myi 'jigs myi sngang skrag par myi gyur la/ zhum par myi 'gyur/
yongs su zhum par myi 'gyur zhing / de'i yid phyir myi ldog la/ thos nas kyang gong du 'dzin cing 'chang la/ klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i phyir ro/ /
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ myi 'jigs myi sngang skrag par myi 'gyur zhing /
zhum par myi 'gyur/ yongs su zhum par myi 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ji ltar brtag par bgyi/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brtag par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor stong pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsams pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor mtshan ma med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor smon pa myed pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/
rab 'byor nam mkha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor skye ba myed pa
la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor 'gag pa myed pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor rnam par byang ba myed pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor de bzhin nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings la
gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor yang dag pa'i mtha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/
rab 'byor mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor rmyi lam la gzhol
ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor gzugs brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor sgra brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor smyig rgyu la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor sgyu ma la gzhol ba'i
bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor sprul pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar stong pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ mtshan ma myed pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog
par 'gyur/ smon pa myed pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ nam mkha'
la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ skye ba ma mchis pa la gzhol ba'i bsam
pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ 'gag pa ma mchis pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ de bzhin nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/
yang dag pa'i mtha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ mnyam pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam
pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ rmyi lam la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ gzugs brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/
sgra brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ smyig rgyu la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ sgyu ma la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ sprul pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs la rtog pa lags sam/ tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ 'du shes la
rtog pa lags sam/ 'du byed la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ myig la rtog pa lags sam/ rna ba la rtog pa lags sam/
sna la rtog pa lags sam/ lce la rtog pa lags sam/ lus la rtog pa lags sam/ yid la rtog pa lags sam/ gzugs la rtog pa lags sam/ sgra la rtog pa
lags sam/ dri la rtog pa lags sam/ ro la rtog pa lags sam/ reg la rtog pa lags sam/ chos la rtog pa lags sam/ myig gi rnam par shes pa la rtog
pa lags sam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ lus kyi rnam par shes
pa la rtog pa lags sam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ rna'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ sna'i 'dus
te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ myig gi
'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ rna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags
sam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la rtog
pa lags sam/ sa'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/ chu'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/ mye'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/ rlung gi khams la rtog pa lags sam/
nam mkha'i khams pa rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/ ma rig pa la rtog pa lags sam/ 'du byed la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa la
rtog pa lags sam/ mying dang gzugs la rtog pa lags sam/ skye mched drug la rtog pa lags sam/ reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ sred pa la rtog pa lags
sam/ len pa la rtog pa lags sam/ srid pa la rtog pa lags sam/ skye ba la rtog pa lags sam/ rga shi la rtog pa lags sam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog
pa lags sam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
rtog pa lags sam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam/ nang stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/
phyi stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ chen po stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/
don dam pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
la rtog pa lags sam/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la
rtog pa lags sam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid
la rtog pa lags sam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags
sam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ dbang po rnams la
rtog pa lags sam/ stobs rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la rtog pa lags sam/
'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ bsam gtan rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ tshad myed pa rnams pa rtog pa lags sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la rtog pa lags sam/ mngon par shes pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ gzungs kyi
sgo rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ myi 'jigs rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la rtog pa
lags sam/ byams pa chen po la rtog pa lags sam/ snying rje chen po la rtog pa lags sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ thams cad shes
pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyis la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ gzugs la rtog pa ma yin no/ /tshor ba la rtog pa ma yon no/ /'du shes la rtog pa ma yin no/ /'du byed la rtog pa
ma yin no/ /rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /myig la rtog pa ma yin no/ /rna ba la rtog pa ma yin no/ /sna la rtog pa ma yin no/ /lce la rtog pa ma yin no/ /lus la rtog pa ma
yin no/ /yid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /gzugs la rtog pa ma yin no/ /sgra la rtog pa ma yin no/ /dri la rtog pa ma yin no/ /ro la rtog pa ma yin no/ /reg la rtog pa ma yin no/ /chos la
rtog pa ma yin no/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa la
rtog pa ma yin no/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la
rtog pa ma yin no/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa

ma yin no/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la rtog pa
ma yin no/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor
ba la rtog pa ma yin no/ /sa'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /chu'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /mye'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /rlung gi khams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /nam mkha'i khams
la rtog pa ma yin no/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /ma rig pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /'du byed la rtog pa ma yin no/ /rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /mying dang gzugs
la rtog pa ma yin no/ /skye mched drug la rtog pa ma yin no/ /reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no/ /sred pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /len pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /srid pa la
rtog pa ma yin no/ /skye ba la rtog pa ma yin no/ /rga shi la rtog pa ma yin no/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /
bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /nang stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /phyi stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la
rtog pa ma yin no/ /chen po stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /'dus ma byas stong
pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la rtog
pa ma yin no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /myi dmyigs pa

stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /dngos po myed pa'i stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /
dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /dbang po rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /
stobs rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
la rtog pa ma yin no/ /bsam gtan rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /tshad myed pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /
rnam par thar pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang /
smon pa myed pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /mngon par shes pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa'i stobs rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /byams pa chen po la rtog pa ma yin no/ /

snying rje chen po la rtog pa ma yin no/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /thams cad shes pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sus kyang ma byas/ rnam par ma byas/ gang nas kyang
ma 'ongs/ gang du yang ma song / phyogs na yang myi gnas/ yul na yang myi gnas/ gang na yang myi gnas pa ste/ de la grangs myi dmyigs so/ /'gro ba dang 'ong ba yang myi dmyigs so/ /gang la

grangs myi dmyigs shing / 'gro ba dang 'ong ba myi dmyigs pa de ni gang gis kyang mngon par 'tshang rgya bar myi nus te/ gzugs kyis ma yin no/ /tshor bas ma yin no/ /'du shes kyis ma yin no/ /'du byed
kyis ma yin no/ /rnam par shes pas ma yin no/ /myig gis ma yin no/ /rna bas ma yin no/ /snas ma yin no/ /lces ma yin no/ /lus kyis ma yin no/ /yid kyis ma yin no/ /gzugs kyis ma
yin no/ /sgras ma yin no/ /dris ma yin no/ /ros ma yin no/ /reg gis ma yin no/ /chos kyis ma yin no/ /myig gi rnam par shes pas ma yin no/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pas ma yin no/ /
sna'i rnam par shes pas ma yin no/ /lce'i rnam par shes pas ma yin no/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pas ma yin no/ /yid kyi rnam par shes par ma yin no/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pas ma
yin no/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas ma yin no/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pas ma yin no/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pas ma yin no/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pas ma yin no/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pas ma yin no/ /myig gi

'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas ma yin no/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas ma yin no/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas ma yin no/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas ma
yin no/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas ma yin no/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas ma yin no/ /sa'i khams kyis ma yin no/ /chu'i khams kyis ma yin no/ /mye'i khams
kyis ma yin no/ /rlung gi khams kyis ma yin no/ /nam mkha'i khams kyis ma yin no/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis ma yin no/ /ma rig pas ma yin no/ /'du byed kyis ma yin no/ /rnam
par shes pas ma yin no/ /mying dang gzugs kyis ma yin no/ /skye mched drug gis ma yin no/ /reg pas ma yin no/ /tshor bas ma yin no/ /sred pas ma yin no/ /len pas ma yin no/ /
srid pas ma yin no/ /skye bas ma yin no/ /rga shis ma yin no/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ma

yin no/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no/ /nang stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /phyi stong pa

nyid kyis ma yin no/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /
'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis

ma yin no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /dngos po

myed pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis ma yin no/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams
kyis ma yin no/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis ma yin no/ /dbang po rnams kyis ma yin no/ /stobs rnams kyis ma yin no/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis ma yin no/ /'phags
pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas ma yin no/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis ma yin no/ /bsam gtan rnams kyis ma yin no/ /tshad myed pa rnams kyis ma yin no/ /gzugs myed pa'i
snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis ma yin no/ /rnam par thar pa rnams kyis ma yin no/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus ma yin no/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
mtshan ma myed dang / smon pa myed pas ma yin no/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyis ma yin no/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis ma yin no/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis ma yin no/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis ma yin no/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams kyis ma yin no/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis ma yin no/ /byams pa chen pos ma yin no/ /snying rje chen pos ma yin no/ /
sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis ma yin no/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus ma yin no/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus ma yin no/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus ma yin
no/ /dgra bcom pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /rang byang chub kyis ma yin no/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/

gzugs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /'du shes nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /'du byed nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid do/ /rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /myig nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /rna ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /sna nyid kyang rnam

pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /lce nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /lus nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /yid nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /gzugs nyid

kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /sgra nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /dri nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /ro nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /reg nyid
kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /chos nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa

nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /lus kyi
rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams

cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i

rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa

thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /

yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /sa'i khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /chu'i khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
do/ /mye'i khams nyid kyang rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /rlung gi khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /
rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /ma rig pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /'du byed nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /rnam par
shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /mying dang gzugs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /skye mched drug nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /reg pa

nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /sred pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /len pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

pa nyid do/ /srid pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /skye ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /rga shi nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa

nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /nang stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid

kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /don dam pa stong pa
nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /mtha'
las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid

stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /myi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /

ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

pa nyid do/ /yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /dbang po nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /

stobs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /
'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /bsam gtan nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /tshad myed pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /gzugs

myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /rnam par thar pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang rnam pa

thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /mngon par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa
thams cad nyid do/ /ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /myi 'jigs pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /byams pa chen po nyid

kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /snying rje chen po nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/

rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de

ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang

yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /myig gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid

gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /rna ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /sna'i de bzhin nyid

gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /lce'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang

yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /lus kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /yid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid

gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /sgra'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /dri'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /ro'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid
gcig pa'o/ /reg gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa

thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin

pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /sna'i rnam par shes

pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni
de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /myig gi 'dus

te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam

pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /lus kyi

'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam
pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni
de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /
lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg

pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de
bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig

pa'o/ /mye'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid
gcig pa'o/ /ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de

bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /mying dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /

skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig
pa'o/ /sred pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /len pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /srid pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /skye ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /

rga shi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de
bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /
bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i

de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de

ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /stong pa nyid stong pa
nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin

pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin
nyid gcig pa'o/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /
mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa
stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin

pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /
myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de
bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa

thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /

rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin

pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid

gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /
'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi
de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /tshad myed pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/
de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /
rnam par thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
dgu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
mtshan pa myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /mngon par
shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin
nyid gcig pa'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /byams

pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u sum bcu brgyad do// //
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po gnyis pa/ de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / lha
rdzas kyi me tog ud pa la dang / pad mo dang / ku mu da dang / pun da ri ka mang po khyer te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su 'thor bar gyur to/ /gtor nas bcom ldan 'das
gang na ba der dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /'khod nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i
lha'i bu de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las 'di skad du/ gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so/ /tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o/ /'du shes nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du shes so/ /'du byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam
pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du byed do/ /rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /myig nyid rnam
pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myig go/ /rna ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'o/ /sna nyid rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'o/ /lce nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'o/ /lus nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus so/ /yid nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid do/ /gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so/ /sgra nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sgra'o/ /dri nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dri'o/ /ro nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ro'o/ /reg nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang reg go/ /chos nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos so/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myig gi rnam par shes pa'o/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /
sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes
pa'o/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myig gi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg
pa'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /yid

kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus
te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor
ba'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te
reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyi tshor ba'o/ /sa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so/ /chu'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chu'i khams so/ /mye'i khams nyid
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mye'i khams so/ /rlung gi khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams
so/ /nam mkha'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so/ /ma rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o/ /'du byed nyid rnam
pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du byed do/ /rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /
mying dang gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mying dang gzugs so/ /skye mched drug nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye mched drug go/ /reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang reg pa'o/ /tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o/ /sred pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sred pa'o/ /len pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang len pa'o/ /srid pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang srid pa'o/ /skye ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba'o/ /rga shi nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rga shi'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /
brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam
pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do/ /phyi stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam

pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do/ /chen po stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do/ /

don dam pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do/ /mtha' las
'das pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang

dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang gi

mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams

cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /

dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa nyid rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams so/ /yang dag par spong ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yang dag par

spong ba rnams so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so/ /dbang po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam
pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so/ /stobs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stobs rnams so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag nyid rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so/ /
bsam gtan nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so/ /tshad myed pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
tshad myed pa rnams so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/ /rnam par
thar pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa nyid rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'o/ /mngon pa shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so/ /ting nge 'dzin nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so/ /gzungs kyi sgo nyid

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs

pa'i stobs rnams so/ /myi 'jigs pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myi 'jigs pa rnams so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam

pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so/ /byams pa chen po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o/ /snying rje chen po nyid rnam

pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas

kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/ /gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar

myed do/ /tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /'du shes

kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang
yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /rnam par
shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /myig gi de bzhin

nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /rna ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /

nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams

cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin

nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams

cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin

pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /dgra bcom pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de

ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid

gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/

gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /zhes ston pa ni 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zab cing blta dka' la/ khong du chud par dka' zhing
brtag tu ma mchis la rtog ge'i spyod yul ma lags te/ zhi zhing phra ba zhib mo mkhas shing rtogs pas rig par bgyi ste/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dka' ba'o/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag
gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so/ /tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o/ /'du shes nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du shes so/ /'du byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du byed do/ /rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /myig nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myig go/ /rna ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'o/ /sna nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'o/ /lce nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'o/ /lus nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus so/ /yid nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid do/ /gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

nyid kyang gzugs so/ /sgra nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sgra'o/ /dri nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dri'o/ /

ro nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ro'o/ /reg nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang reg go/ /chos nyid rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos so/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myig gi rnam par shes pa'o/ /
rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam
pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /lus

kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams

cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myig gi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa

nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i
'dus te reg pa'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg
pa'o/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg

pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /sa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so/ /chu'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid kyang chu'i khams so/ /mye'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mye'i khams so/ /rlung gi khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams so/ /nam mkha'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so/ /rnam par shes pa'i
khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so/ /ma rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o/ /'du byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du byed do/ /rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa

thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /mying dang gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mying dang gzugs so/ /skye mched drug nyid rnam pa thams

cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye mched drug go/ /reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang reg pa'o/ /tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o/ /sred pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sred pa'o/ /len pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa

thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang len pa'o/ /srid pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang srid pa'o/ /skye ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

pa nyid kyang skye ba'o/ /rga shi nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rga shi'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /

bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nang stong pa
nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nang stong pa'o/ /phyi stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa

nyid do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do/ /chen po stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus

byas stong pa nyid do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams

cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang

thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam pa thams

cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos thams cad

stong pa nyid do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid do/ /

ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams so/ /yang dag
par spong ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so/ /dbang po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so/ /stobs nyid
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stobs rnams so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
pa'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so/ /bsam gtan nyid rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so/ /tshad myed pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshad myed
pa rnams so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/ /rnam
par thar pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan pa myed pa dang / smon pa
myed pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'o/ /mngon par shes pa nyid
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so/ /ting nge 'dzin nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so/ /gzungs kyi sgo nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so/ /myi 'jigs pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myi 'jigs pa rnams so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
so/ /byams pa chen po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o/ /snying rje chen po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam
pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
pa rnams so// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po gsum pa/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /myig gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa

de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /rna ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis

su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /sna'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /

lce'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /lus kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /yid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin

nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /sgra'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de

bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /dri'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/
